alert.note: Alert for Kewaunee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:52PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Kewaunee County through 430 PM CDT... At 351 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Luxemburg, or 8 miles east of Bay Shore Park, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Algoma around 410 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Kewaunee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
